pages.text: A $(thing)Lapidary Calibration$() augment allows for a  $(l:mods_thermalexpansion/numismatic_dynamo)Numismatic Dynamo$() to use use various gemstones as fuel, and increases the amount of Redstone Flux it generates by 25%. The dynamo will only accept compatible gemstones.

pages.title: Fuels
pages.text: The following items are accepted as fuel in a $(thing)Numismatic Dynamo$() with $(thing)Lapidary Calibration$():$(li)$(item)Nether Quartz$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Lapis Lazuli$(): 80 000$(li)$(item)Prismarine Shard$(): 150 000RF$(li)$(item)Emerald$(): 200 000 RF$(li)$(item)Diamond$(): 1 200 000 RF$(li)$(item)Flux Crystal$(): 1 500 000 RF$(li)$(item)Apatite$(): 40 000 RF
